content: उद्वेष्टन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Loosened; कयाचिदुद्वेष्टनवांतमाल्यः <ls>R. 7. 6</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 57.</ls> {@--2@} Freed from bonds, unfettered, unbound. --नं {@--1@} The act of surrounding or enclosing. {@--2@} An enclosure, fence. {@--3@} A pain in the buttocks or back of the body; हृदय° convulsive pain in the heart.
